attributes.actor: Steve Wilson'''Theon&#39;s master of hounds''' is an unnamed minor character in the Season 2
attributes.7: yes==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Farlen, the Master of Hounds at Winterfell, is forced to help Theon in is hunt. Although this character is established and appears in this episode he does not participate in the hunt.==References==ReflistCategory:CharactersCategory:Season 2 CharactersCategory:Minor CharactersCategory:Status: DeadCategory:IronbornCategory:House GreyjoyCategory:Unnamed CharactersCategory:Characters from the Iron Islands

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, [[Farlen]], the Master of Hounds at Winterfell, is forced to help Theon in is hunt. Although this character is established and appears in this episode he does not participate in the hunt.
